DataElement.preferredName: Derkay Recurrent Papillomatosis Result Trachea Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Named tracheal anatomic site examined for recurrent papillomatosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Derkay Staging System Papillomatosis Assessment Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A staging system for assessment of recurrent respiratory papillomatosis (RRP). The staging system includes a functional assessment of severity as well as an anatomic assessment of disease distribution. The anatomic score can then be used in combination with the functional assessment to measure an individual patient's clinical course and response to therapy over time._Glandular or squamous cell neoplastic proliferations characterized by the formation of multiple papillary structures diffusely involving a specific anatomic site._The result of an action._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A staging system for assessment of recurrent respiratory papillomatosis (RRP). The staging system includes a functional assessment of severity as well as an anatomic assessment of disease distribution. The anatomic score can then be used in combination with the functional assessment to measure an individual patient's clinical course and response to therapy over time.:Glandular or squamous cell neoplastic proliferations characterized by the formation of multiple papillary structures diffusely involving a specific anatomic site.

Concepts.definition: A staging system for assessment of recurrent respiratory papillomatosis (RRP). The staging system includes a functional assessment of severity as well as an anatomic assessment of disease distribution. The anatomic score can then be used in combination with the functional assessment to measure an individual patient's clinical course and response to therapy over time.
Glandular or squamous cell neoplastic proliferations characterized by the formation of multiple papillary structures diffusely involving a specific anatomic site.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
The result of an action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR clinical trial.8.11.2016.dmr

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Named locations of or within the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Higher in place or position; the topmost one of two.: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.: The fibrocartilaginous, mucous-lined tube passing from the larynx to the bronchi.

Concepts.definition: Higher in place or position; the topmost one of two.
Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.
The fibrocartilaginous, mucous-lined tube passing from the larynx to the bronchi.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The bottom one of two.: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.: The fibrocartilaginous, mucous-lined tube passing from the larynx to the bronchi.

Concepts.definition: The bottom one of two.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Surgical formation of an opening into the trachea through the neck, or the opening so created.: A surgically created opening from an area inside the body to the outside.

Concepts.definition: Creation of a surgical opening into the trachea.
A surgically created opening from an area inside the body to the outside.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: Tubular structure in continuation with the trachea, serving as air passage. It terminates in the lung (terminal bronchiole).

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
Tubular structure in continuation with the trachea, serving as air passage. It terminates in the lung (terminal bronchiole).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An intermediate part or section; an area that is approximately central within some larger region.: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.: The fibrocartilaginous, mucous-lined tube passing from the larynx to the bronchi.

Concepts.definition: An intermediate part or section; an area that is approximately central within some larger region.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: Tubular structure in continuation with the trachea, serving as air passage. It terminates in the lung (terminal bronchiole).
